text: As with all dollaramas this is a great place to pick up small household items you need along with snacks and even find that rare toy they received overstock of.  The staff here are mostly friendly elderly folks who are willing to lend a helping hand if you need one.   I find this dollarama in particular has lots of great items in stock and a lot of rare gems as well.  All dollaramas are different, but it seems like smaller ones such as this get some decent stock that others don't most of the time.  This place is great and you can't beat the price by any means!

Si ce n'est pas un concept extra-ordinaire que d'inventer un magasin ou tout est à moins de 1$ (ou presque)  Quel étudiant français ne reverrait pas de pouvoir remplir ses tiroirs de cuisine pour 10 ou 20$ ? Aucun!  C'est une mine de petites choses que l'on a besoin tous les jours, les prix peuvent monter jusqu'à 2,5$ (je n'ai jamais vu plus) pour les plus gros objets! Mais c'est vrai que l'on se demande comment un magasin comme ça arrive à tenir! mais ca marche! et c'est merveilleux!
